description.english: Welcome to the fallen kingdom of Talia!
description.spanish: Bienvenido al reino caído de Talia

description.english: A friend in the good and the bad
description.spanish: Un amigo en las buenas y en las malas

description.english: The great wall destroyed by the passage of time.
description.spanish: Una muralla que ha sobrevivido al paso del tiempo.

description.english: You already have something to defend yourself
description.spanish: Ya tienes algo con que defenderte

description.english: A magic light gave you life
description.spanish: Un cristal mágico que da vida
Gana una ronda en el coliseo
Activa una palanca por primera vez
Perdido en un mar lleno de naufragios
Sobrevive más de 1 minuto en el modo historia

description.english: I do not want to leave it

description.spanish: Sobrevive más de 2 minutos en el modo historia

description.english: "And you will know my name is the lord when i lay my vengeance upon thee."
description.spanish: "And you will know my name is the lord when i lay my vengeance upon thee."

description.english: "You talkin’ to me? Well, I'm the only one here."
description.spanish: "You talkin’ to me? Well, I'm the only one here."

description.english: "Time to nut up or shut up!."
description.spanish: "Time to nut up or shut up!."

description.english: "Roads? Where we're going we don't need roads."
description.spanish: "Roads? Where we're going we don't need roads."

description.english: "You shoot me in a dream, you better wake up and apologize."
description.spanish: "You shoot me in a dream, you better wake up and apologize."

description.english: "I love the smell of napalm in the morning."
description.spanish: "I love the smell of napalm in the morning."

description.english: "Let's put a smile on that face."
description.spanish: "Let's put a smile on that face."

description.english: You got an achiviement, but where is it?
description.spanish: Has desbloqueado un logro, pero... donde está?

description.english: You got another one, but still missing the design!
description.spanish: Has desbloqueado otro logro, pero aún no hay diseño!

description.english: You got an... (hum, maybe it's a glitch, can't see it) achievement.
description.spanish: Has desbloquea... (hum, quizá sea un error, no lo puedo ver), logro.

description.english: You got an achievement, but our design is in another castle.
description.spanish: Has desbloqueado un logro, pero nuestro diseño está en otro castillo.

description.english: You got an achievement, but the design is at 100% opacity, sorry.
description.spanish: Has desbloqueado un logro, pero el diseño está con 100% de opacidad, lo sentimos.

description.english: You got an achievement, but we fired our designer so, no cool graphics.
description.spanish: Has desbloqueado un logro, pero hemos despedido a nuestro diseñador, nada de graficos cool.

description.english: You got an achievement, yes we were trolling you, use this transparent set for profile design!
description.spanish: Has desbloqueado un logro, si te hemos estado tralleando, usa este set de logros para customizar tu perfil.
